translation.text: https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Inbound and Outbound Train Delay
Milwaukee West inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 25 minutes behind schedule due to mechanical problems on train #2233. Please visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
RI-The Joliet East End Elevator is Out of Service
The Rock Island Joliet Eastern Avenue elevator will be out of service until further notice. Customers can use the Station west elevator to access the boarding platform.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
MWD 2242 - Delayed

MDW train #2242 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 4:49 PM, may be operating 25 to 30 minutes behind schedule, due to mechanical problems. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
Metra Will Operate Reduced Schedules Friday, January 23

Metra will operate on a reduced schedule for all lines Friday, January 23 due to severe cold weather forecasted in the Chicagoland area. Riders are advised that travel times may be increased due to speed restrictions. Visit metra.com for schedule info.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 103rd street/Rosemoor Elevator
The 103rd Street/Rosemoor elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
MDN 2223 - Delayed

MDW train #2223 scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 4:58 PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule, due to a medical emergency . Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN Inbound and Outbound Train Delay
Milwaukee North inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 25 minutes behind schedule due to mechanical problems on train #2233. Please visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
BNSF 1305 DELAYED
BNSF  train #1305 scheduled to arrive Aurora at 5:12 PM, may be operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule, due to freight train interference . Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.

ME The 51st/53rd Street/Hyde Park East elevator
The 51st/53rd Street/Hyde Park East elevator is back in service.

NCS 113 ON THE MOVE
NCS train #113, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:01 PM, is on the move and maybe operating 20 to 30 minutes behind schedule due to earlier mechanical problems
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW 2233- Will Not Operate

MDW train #2233, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 4:55 PM, will not operate due to mechanical problems. Trains #22 35 and #2237, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:10 and 5:17 PM will accommodate passengers.
